wepppy.nodb.mods.lt.lt.read_lc_file(fname)¶

Reads a file containing landcover parameters and returns a dictionary with tuple keys (LndcvrID, WEPP_Type) and namedtuple values with fields:

Code, LndcvrID, WEPP_Type, New_WEPPman, ManName, Albedo, iniSatLev, interErod, rillErod, critSh, effHC, soilDepth, Sand, Clay, OM, CEC
wepppy.nodb.mods.lt.lt.soil_specialization(src, dst, replacements)¶

Creates a new soil file based on soil_in_fname and makes replacements from the provided replacements namedtuple
